name: AQUAPRIM MICRO
description: AQUAPRIM MICRO is a Opacifying universal primer available in the finishing color and water-based acrylic resin primer. Which is a Unsaponifiable, Microporous, Recoverable during the day, High build and opacity, Certified Excell Green Zone. Outdoors and indoors on concrete, cement plaster, wood and non-tannic derivatives, glass, porcelain stoneware, polycarbonate, aluminum, weathered galvanized steel, weathered zinc, electrogalvanized, PVC, bare or coated with old paint members in good condition. Indoors exclusively, on paint coating, plasterboard with cardboard skin and copper. The supports must comply with the DTU concerning them and in particular with NF DTU 59.1. Prior recognition necessary in order to determine the most suitable preparation for their condition and nature (cleaning, washing/rinsing, sanding, scraping, degreasing, roughening, dusting, etc.).
